messages.title: Putting local people first
messages.content: An independent voice for your area. Vote Shas Sheehan. Plan Raynes Park.

messages.title: AND LABOUR ADMIT THEY WOULDN'T MAKE IT FAIRER...
messages.content: THE CONSERVATIVES WILL CUT DEEPER AND FASTER. Ed Miliband has admitted that under a Labour Government there would still be cuts to local services like schools and hospitals, and sadly the council tax bill in Merton is already the second highest in London.

messages.title: Creating opportunity for everyone
messages.content: Shas Sheehan and her team want to give everyone a fair start in life.

messages.title: The race to be the next MP for Wimbledon
messages.content: Only Lib Dem Shas Sheehan can beat Stephen Hammond.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: We will cut taxes by £700 for most working people.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A stronger economy with opportunity for all
keyPolicies.policyDescription: We will balance the budget fairly and invest to build a high-skill, low-carbon economy.
We will guarantee equal care for mental health and invest £8 billion to improve our NHS.
We will guarantee education funding from nursery to 19 and qualified teachers in every class.
We will build the homes Britain needs, aiming to reach 300,000 homes a year, while protecting the green belt.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Only Lib Dem Shas Sheehan can beat Stephen Hammond.

issues.economy: We will balance the budget fairly and invest to build a high-skill, low-carbon economy.
issues.education: We will guarantee education funding from nursery to 19 and qualified teachers in every class.
issues.health: We will guarantee equal care for mental health and invest £8 billion to improve our NHS.

housing.content: We will build the homes Britain needs, aiming to reach 300,000 homes a year, while protecting the green belt.
